Class JExpress

  • java.lang.Object
    • JExpress

  • public class JExpress
extends java.lang.Object
    An express.js-like application framework Compile the application with : javac JExpress.java Run the application with : java JExpress Get the documentation with : javadoc -d ../doc JExpress.java

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  JExpress.Callback
      A callback called to process a HTTP request in order to create a HTTP response.
      static interface  JExpress.Request
      A HTTP request
      static interface  JExpress.Response
      A HTTP response

      Routes an HTTP request if the HTTP method is DELETE.

      Creates an Express like application.

      Routes an HTTP request if the HTTP method is GET.

      Starts a server on the given port and listen for connections.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        public void get(java.lang.String path,
                JExpress.Callback callback)
        Routes an HTTP request if the HTTP method is GET.
        Parameters:
        path - a string representation of a path with interpolation.
        callback - a callback called when a client emits a HTTP request to create an HTTP response.

        Parameters:

        Throws:
